pullrequest.title: Proposal: scoping rules, allow everything to use //pose[@relative_to]

content.raw:
"While there may be use cases that benefit from embedding explicit frames inside their `attached_to` link, doing so adds unnecessary complexity. 

“Frames would require additional scopes to be resolved, and the ability to reference frames across links would be limited.”

OR

“It would require additional frames to be resolved, and limit the ability to reference frames across links.”

\(I think this sentence was a bit convoluted before. The second clause seemed like it was talking about a solution opposite to the subject of the first clause, not just opposite to the benefit mentioned. Again, feel free to ignore if it changes the meaning.\)
